name: graviton
author: Jeremy Barnes
description: Spafax HUB media asset management software

scripts.start-dev: rm -rf build && mkdir build && tsc && npm run start-dev-ts-compiler && npm run start-dev-electron-app
scripts.start-dev-electron-app: start "electron application" bash -c 'cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --exec "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ./build/main.js"'
scripts.build: rm -rf build dist && mkdir "build/public" dist && tsc && cp src/images/app.ico build && cp -r ../renderer/public/static/* ./build/public
